About Me

I'm a Full-Stack Web Developer with a passion for creative design and problem solving. I have 3+ years of professional experience in all phases of the development process. I believe coding is an artform and I work hard everyday at mastering my craft.
Strategy
I collaborate with clients to transform raw ideas into well thought out designs.
UX/UI
I create websites with intuitive UI patterns and simple interactions.
Responsive
Experienced in creating responsive layouts that look great on all devices.
Code
I focus on writing SOLID code that is efficient, modular and easy to read.
